__e: Not that it would do any good.
Well, it'll be worse for everyone if he does come back and you're still here.
We're searching the skies for you, I don't know where you are. If you're coming back, when you're coming back. You just--
If he doesn't show I'm screwed.
Very well. Let him only come home to his old room and things will be as they were before.
If she doesn't come back, you've got plenty of other people you can shoot.
We should probably take better care of that 'cause if he comes back, he'll be pissed off about the thing.
And if he doesn't come back, he won't be missed.
But if he comes back you don't think he'll try to kill you, do you?
